snippet: The alarming expulsion of the Al Jazeera correspondent from China has parallels in other parts of Asia. In Thailand, for example, an online journalist who failed to move quickly enough to erase royal insults from her Web site now finds herself in...
abstract: The alarming expulsion of the Al Jazeera correspondent from China has parallels in other parts of Asia. In Thailand, for example, an online journalist who failed to move quickly enough to erase royal insults from her Web site now finds herself in judicial peril.

headline.main: China's Expulsion of Journalist Has Parallels in Thailand

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
